attributes.action: Petition for the resignation of Teresa may pm
attributes.additional_details: For grossly misleading the electorate in starring she would deliver the results of the referendum and leave completely the eu
attributes.background: In coming to power her manifesto stated she would leave The EU and deliver brexit as stated in the referendum ....she has shown she has no intention of doing this and further is  planning to keep us tied to there laws and customs union

rejection.details:
The resignation of the Prime Minister would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or Parliament, you could start a petition about that.
